elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Decide whether the following federal votes were accepted or rejected. Give brief reasons for your answer.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Yes votes: 1,102,436 No votes: 877,466 Votes: 10 Yes, 12 No Majority required: Double majority
elements.correctAnswer:
Popular majority: Yes, majority of the cantons: No
Thus, the double majority was not achieved. The federal vote was rejected due to a negative majority of the cantons.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Yes votes: 1,402,436 No votes: 774,665 Votes: 19 Yes, 4 No Majority required: Double majority
elements.correctAnswer:
Popular majority: Yes, majority of the cantons: Yes
Thus, a double majority was achieved. The federal vote was therefore accepted.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Yes votes: 934 234 No votes: 954 524 States: 14 Yes, 9 No Required majority: Popular majority
elements.correctAnswer: The vote was rejected due to a negative majority. The positive majority of the cantons has no influence on the popular majority.
